example.name: all args
example.text: But it isn't clear how long GM-1 would be willing *trace*-1 to fight Ford for Jaguar.

example.name: missing combatant
example.text: But the government's action, which caught Jaguar management flat-footed, may scuttle the GM minority deal by forcing it to fight for all of Jaguar.

example.name: missing spoils
example.text: But healthy skepticism vanishes when they-1 are solicited by an organized charity *trace*-1 to help fight cancer, famine, child abuse, or what have you.
example.arg: cancer, famine, child abuse, or what have you

example.name: intransitive
example.text: However, Judge Hastings has said he-1 will continue *trace*-1 to fight and is contemplating an appeal of any impeachment to the U.S. Supreme Court.

example.name: all args
example.text: Eventually , Texaco , which was forced into bankruptcyproceedings by that litigation , settled its fight with Pennzoilfor $ 3 billion in 1986 .

example.name: with instrument
example.text: I'll Fight Them Off with My Own Non-Existent Mental Bolts !

roleset.name: continue fighting

example.name: Fighter 1
example.text: * Seeing Meinung's people fight on and Liuchia's silently enduring, one can't help but ask, "Are the Hakka people fated * * to wander the world?
